# seaweedfs_iam_user_policy (Resource)

Manages an inline IAM user policy in SeaweedFS.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String)
- `policy` (String) JSON policy document.
- `user_name` (String)

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.
